<title>Payment Authorization - Forge3</title>
<meta name="description" content="Streamline your ActiveAgency subscription payments with auto-pay. Complete this secure form so Forge3 can process payment for your invoices." />
<meta name="robots" content="noindex, follow" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />

<meta property="og:description" content="Streamline your ActiveAgency subscription payments with auto-pay. Complete this secure form so Forge3 can process payment for your invoices." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://forge3.com/payment-authorization/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Forge3" />
<meta property="article:publisher" content="https://www.facebook.com/Forge3Ltd/" />
<meta property="article:modified_time" content="2022-08-29T19:52:37+00:00" />
<meta property="og:image" content="https://forge3.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Forge3-ActiveAgency-General-Open-Graph.jpg" />
	<meta property="og:image:width" content="1280" />
	<meta property="og:image:height" content="720" />
	<meta property="og:image:type" content="image/jpeg" />
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
<meta name="twitter:site" content="@Forge3" />
